    • addBooking

      public boolean addBooking(String userId, FlipFitGyms gym, FlipFitSlot slot)
      Adds a booking for a user if the specified slot is available.
      Specified by:
      addBooking in interface BookingInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user making the booking.
      gym - The gym object representing the selected gym.
      slot - The time slot object representing the chosen time slot.
      Returns:
      true if the booking is successfully added, false otherwise.

    • checkValidBooking

      Checks if a booking is valid for a given slot and gym. Currently not implemented.
      Specified by:
      checkValidBooking in interface BookingInterface
      Parameters:
      slotId - The ID of the slot to check.
      gymId - The ID of the gym to check.
      Returns:

    • cancelBooking

      public boolean cancelBooking(String userID, String slotID)
      Cancels an existing booking based on user ID and slot ID.
      Specified by:
      cancelBooking in interface BookingInterface
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user whose booking is to be canceled.
      slotID - The ID of the slot to be canceled.
      Returns:
      true if the booking was successfully canceled, false otherwise.
